title: kuTilam asatImi
sahitya:
kuTilam asatImi mAmaramara dayamEvam


caraNam 1    hEya surapANa sadAshONita nEtrAmtAm rAgamanyu lObha mOha shamala bharita svAntam
    caraNam 2    muhurapi mattapraLapanamavasham kalayantIm svAmiha samAlOkya vINA kAraNam hasantIm
    caraNam 3    padmanAbha padavi smaraNai kahEtu bhUtam AtmanO najanannayamapi cirataramEtAm
